articles.description: F. Lee Bailey, the outspoken and pugilistic defense attorney widely credited as the man who secured a "not guilty" verdict for NFL star O.J. Simpson, died in Georgia on Thursday at the age of 87.
articles.content: LOS ANGELES, CA – OCTOBER 3: Murder defendant O.J. Simpson (C) listens to the not guilty verdict with his attorneys F. Lee Bailey (L) and Johnnie Cochran Jr (R). Simpson was found not guilty of killi… [+7099 chars]
